Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Texas in 2010...
Traded from Texas to Chicago (N) on 6/8/2014 (Going to TEX: P J. Verlander, P W. Rodriguez, P E. Santana, 1B N. Swisher, SS N. Fontana. Going to CHN: SS M. Machado, P C. Lee, 1B J. Morneau, RF E.
Chavez)...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/8/2014, off John Maine (NYA)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/13/2014, off Joseph Lathan (STL)...
Injured on 5/15/2015 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 2016...
Hit for the cycle against Cincinnati on 5/4/2018...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 5/10/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/14/2018, hitting .609 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 9/22/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/1/2020, hitting .533 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 4/14/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/17/2022, hitting .556 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/21/2022, hitting .571 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/6/2022, hitting .577 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 9/24/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2023, hitting .409 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2023, hitting .579 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/29/2024, hitting .435 with 8 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2024, hitting .372 with 14 HR, 31 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cincinnati on 5/17/2025...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2025, hitting .355 with 11 HR, 27 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 10/5/2025, off Moises Cavallo (SDN)...
